title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 813.1 - Background and intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 813.1 - Background and intent

State Regulations

This Part sets forth the requirements and conditions for
receipt of funding assistance for capital improvement projects proposed or
undertaken by eligible providers of addiction services certified and funded by
the Office of Alcoholism and Substance Abuse Services ("Office" or "OASAS") to
ensure appropriate use by providers and security of monies made available from
state funding sources. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
813.1

Adopted

New

York State Register May 17, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 20, eff. 5/17/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
